deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@dev Implementation of the {IERC1820Implementer} interface.
 Contracts may inherit from this and call {_registerInterfaceForAddress} to
 declare their willingness to be implementers.
 {IERC1820Registry-setInterfaceImplementer} should then be called for the
 registration to be complete.

@dev Declares the contract as willing to be an implementer of
 `interfaceHash` for `account`.
 See {IERC1820Registry-setInterfaceImplementer} and
 {IERC1820Registry-interfaceHash}.

devdoc.details: Implementation of the {IERC1820Implementer} interface. Contracts may inherit from this and call {_registerInterfaceForAddress} to declare their willingness to be implementers. {IERC1820Registry-setInterfaceImplementer} should then be called for the registration to be complete.
